I am new here but I have had excellent success with using running water in =
the background.

Heather




  Al

  Sweep tuning can be used on AM FM shor=
twave etc. I have had some 
  success without tuning just allowing them to =
use the static or water 
  noise thats in background. Best advice one cold =
give is try it 
  yourself for a while and see what you come up with =3D)

=
  Misty

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "threadsintyme@..." 
  <Threadsi=
ntyme@...> wrote:
  >
  > Why do you need to "sweep" the AM spectrum? 
  > =
Has anyone tried this but without sweeps on the shortwave band? Has 
  any =
research been done? Could it be that the AM band has some sort 
  of "speci=
al properties" that would allow such communication? 
  > Why is it that the=
 AM band has to be used with a radio station 
  playing? There are parts of=
 the spectrum that is just outside of that 
  spectrum that might provide a=
 better form of communication. 
  > Al
